data.title: Pierce Brosnan’s Children: All About Sean, Chris, Charlotte, Dylan, and Paris
data.meta_description: Pierce Brosnan is a father of five children. He has four sons and one late daughter. Here's everything about Sean, Chris, Charlotte, Dylan, and Pari.
data.text:
Pierce Brosnan is a father of five children. He has four sons and one late daughter: Christopher, 51 years old; Sean, 40 years old; Dylan, 27 years old; Paris, 23 years old; and Charlotte, his late daughter. He shares Christopher, Sean, and Charlotte with his first wife, the late actress Cassandra Harris. He shares Dylan and Paris with his current wife, Keely Shaye Smith.

Pierce Brosnan always wanted his kids to “feel like they belong” and “know the love of family.” In 2008, he expressed how much he values the time he spends with his children, emphasizing the importance of their presence in his life.

The deaths of his wife Cassandra in 1991 and his daughter Charlotte in 2013 from ovarian cancer profoundly impacted him, making him even more aware of the precious time spent with his children.

Pierce taught his kids essential skills such as “preparation, passion, confidence, and showing up on time.” However, he encourages them to avoid pursuing a career in acting, preferring that they find their paths away from the challenges of the film industry.

Christopher Brosnan, Pierce Brosnan’s estranged son, recently made a rare public appearance in London. He was seen running errands at a Waitrose grocery store on June 21, 2024. This outing marked one of the few times Christopher has been seen publicly in recent years.

Pierce Brosnan recently shared a heartfelt glimpse into his Father’s Day celebration on Instagram. The 71-year-old actor expressed his gratitude for the love and joy his family brings him, posting a photo of himself with a pot of sunflowers, a gift from his family. In his caption, he wrote, “Thank you dear family for filling my life with your love. You give me wings to fly. I love you all dearly. It was a joyful Father’s Day“.

Here’s everything to know about Pierce Brosnan’s children: Sean, Chris, Charlotte, Dylan, and Paris.

Meet Pierce Brosnan’s Kids

Pierce Brosnan has five children: Christopher, 51, Sean, 40, Dylan, 27, Paris, 23, and his late daughter, Charlotte. Christopher and Charlotte were adopted after their biological father’s death, shared with his first wife, Cassandra Harris, who died of ovarian cancer in 1991. Sean, his second son with Cassandra, is an actor and filmmaker. Dylan and Paris, with Keely Shaye Smith, are involved in modeling and filmmaking. Despite Christopher’s struggles with addiction, Pierce remains hopeful. Charlotte tragically died in 2013 from ovarian cancer.

Get to know everything about Pierce Brosnan’s 5 children.

Charlotte Brosnan

Charlotte Brosnan was born on November 27, 1971, to actress Cassandra Harris and her first husband, Dermot Harris. After Dermot’s death in 1986, Charlotte, along with her brother Christopher, was adopted by Pierce Brosnan when he married their mother. Tragically, Cassandra passed away from ovarian cancer in 1991, deeply affecting the family.

Charlotte pursued a career in acting, appearing in series like “NYPD Blue.” However, she prioritized her family life, particularly after marrying her long-term partner, Alex Smith. Together, they had two children, Isabella and Lucas. Charlotte was known for her devotion to her family, often expressing that her role as a mother was the most important to her.

In 2013, Charlotte was diagnosed with ovarian cancer, the same disease that had claimed her mother’s life. After a three-year battle, she passed away on June 28, 2013, at the age of 42, surrounded by her family. Pierce Brosnan, who remained close to her throughout her life, expressed his grief and admiration for her strength and dignity during her illness. He continues to honor her memory publicly, reflecting on the deep bond they shared and the profound impact her loss has had on him and their family.

Christopher Brosnan, 51

Christopher Brosnan is the 51-year-old adopted son of Pierce Brosnan and the late Cassandra Harris. Born to Harris and her first husband, Dermot Harris, Christopher and his sister Charlotte were adopted by Pierce after Dermot’s death in 1986. Christopher pursued filmmaking, studying at UCLA and the New York Film Academy, and worked on several of Pierce’s movies, including “Tomorrow Never Dies” and “The Thomas Crown Affair”​.

Unfortunately, Christopher has struggled with drug addiction for many years, leading to a strained relationship with his father. His issues included multiple arrests and a period of coma due to an overdose. In 2005, Pierce Brosnan made the painful decision to cut ties with Christopher in hopes that it would prompt him to seek recovery. Despite this estrangement, Pierce has expressed continued hope for Christopher’s recovery and included him in a heartfelt Father’s Day post in 2022​.

Christopher was recently seen in public running errands in London, marking a rare appearance that has brought attention to his ongoing struggles and complicated relationship with his father​.

Sean Brosnan, 40

Sean Brosnan, the son of Pierce Brosnan and Cassandra Harris, is an actor and filmmaker. Born in 1983, he has had a diverse career in the entertainment industry. Sean directed the critically acclaimed film “My Father Die” in 2016 and is currently working on his latest project, “Wolfland,” a horror-thriller featuring his father, Pierce Brosnan, as a legendary werewolf hunter. The film is co-written by Sean and Matt D’Elia, with production expected to begin later this year in the UK​.

Sean Brosnan has recently undergone a significant transformation for his upcoming role in the critically acclaimed play Waiting for Godot. Sean lost almost 30 pounds to prepare for his role as Vladimir.

Sean’s career includes acting roles in movies such as “Don Peyote” (2014) and “Acts of Violence” (2018). His directing work, particularly in the horror genre, has garnered attention for its creativity and impact. Sean’s relationship with his father has been supportive, with Pierce often expressing pride in Sean’s accomplishments and collaborating with him on projects​.

Despite a promising career, Sean has faced personal challenges, including a severe car accident in 2000 that required multiple surgeries and extensive rehabilitation. He has also been open about the emotional impact of losing his mother, Cassandra, to ovarian cancer in 1991, a loss that deeply affected the Brosnan family.

Dylan Brosnan, 27

Dylan Brosnan, born on January 13, 1997, is the son of Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Smith. He is a multi-talented individual, working as a model, musician, and filmmaker. Dylan has modeled for high-profile brands like Burberry and Saint Laurent and has appeared on several magazine covers. He is also a composer and producer, known for his work on “Out of Reach” and “Poisoning Paradise.”

Dylan shares a close relationship with his father, often attending events together, including the premiere of Pierce’s film “The Out-Laws.” Dylan, along with his brother Paris, was named a Golden Globe Ambassador in 2020, a role that made their father very proud​.

Paris Brosnan, 23

Paris Brosnan, born on February 27, 2001, is the youngest son of Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Smith. He is a model, filmmaker, and social activist. Paris has modeled for high-profile brands like Burberry and Dolce & Gabbana and starred in a campaign for Paul & Shark with his father​.

Paris recently graduated from Loyola Marymount University’s School of Film and Television, marking a significant milestone in his budding career as a filmmaker​ (Smooth)​. He often collaborates with his father, who has been a significant inspiration and influence on his artistic pursuits. Pierce and Paris share a close bond, frequently seen together at public events and in modeling campaigns.

Conclusion

Pierce Brosnan’s children reflect a diverse blend of talents and resilience, shaped by both triumphs and challenges. Christopher Brosnan, despite his struggles with addiction, continues to strive for recovery. Sean Brosnan has carved a niche in filmmaking, following in his father’s creative footsteps. Dylan Brosnan excels in modeling and music, showcasing his multifaceted skills. Paris Brosnan is making his mark in filmmaking and modeling, deeply inspired by his father. Through it all, Pierce Brosnan remains a devoted and proud father, nurturing his children’s unique paths and celebrating their successes.

Pierce Brosnan’s Children – FAQs

Who are Pierce Brosnan’s children?

Pierce Brosnan has five children. Christopher Brosnan and Charlotte Brosnan were adopted from his first wife, Cassandra Harris, who passed away in 1991. Sean Brosnan is his biological son with Cassandra. From his marriage to Keely Shaye Smith, Pierce has two sons: Dylan Brosnan, a model and musician, and Paris Brosnan, a model and filmmaker. Tragically, Charlotte passed away from ovarian cancer in 2013.

How many biological children did Pierce Brosnan have?

Pierce Brosnan has three biological children: Sean Brosnan, Dylan Brosnan, and Paris Brosnan.

What happened to Pierce Brosnan’s daughter?

Pierce Brosnan’s adopted daughter, Charlotte Brosnan, passed away from ovarian cancer in 2013.

Who is Pierce Brosnan’s wife?

Pierce Brosnan’s wife is Keely Shaye Smith. They married in 2001.

Is Pierce Brosnan a millionaire?

Yes, Pierce Brosnan is a millionaire. He has amassed considerable wealth through his successful acting career.
